whyUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyUs.description: At the <1>Agencia Ethan Comunicaciones</1>, we understand the challenges of modern brands. We become your strategic partner to boost your digital presence with creative ideas, constant innovation, and strategies that connect with your audience.

seo.title: Brochure and Services
seo.description: Discover our services and team. We boost your digital presence with strategy, design, and audiovisual production.
seo.keywords: services, team, brochure, marketing, design, video, web, Ethan Comunicaciones

about.title: Who we are
about.description: <1>Ethan Communications Agency</1> has extensive experience, a qualified human team, and expertise in the communications and media market. Based in Itagüí, Antioquia, we have high expectations of being one of the leading communications agencies in the Aburrá Valley. We are characterized by facilitating the processes of our allied brands to contribute to the fulfillment of their commercial and digital objectives in the market.

camilo.bio: Lover of communications, advertising, and design. Leader by nature and convinced that good things MUST happen to good people.

jhonathan.bio: Passionate about audiovisual and strategic projects. Extensive experience in pre-production, production, and post-production of audiovisual content and streaming.

jose.bio: Passionate about the audiovisual world. Convinced that great stories can be told through the lens.

sara.bio: Passionate about the digital ecosystem, marketing, and branding.

ads.title: Digital Advertising
ads.description: Digital Advertising — Upon quote: increase in followers, views, and positioning through influencers, digital, and print media.

prices.label: Full package (6 hours · Advertising billboard · 1000 flyers)

sound.title: Sound and Lighting Rental
sound.description1: Two speakers · Audio console · 2 microphones (wired or wireless) · Accompanied by a sound operator — $350,000 VAT included (for four hours).
sound.description2: We also offer tents, stages, LED screens, and higher sound wattage — upon quote.

consulting.title: Marketing Consulting
consulting.description: Upon quote: social media audit, digital asset analysis, evaluation of current strategy, and action plan to boost your brand in sales. Includes value proposition evaluation and target audience analysis.
